<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// innermost containing loop.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Flags controlling how much is checked when sinking or hoisting</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function deletes dead loops. The caller of this function needs to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">/// guarantee that the loop is infact dead.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to promote memory values to scalars by sinking stores out of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the loop and moving loads to before the loop.  We do this by looping over</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the stores in the loop, looking for stores to Must pointers which are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop invariant. It takes a set of must-alias values, Loop exit blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vector, loop exit blocks insertion point vector, PredIteratorCache,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LoopInfo, DominatorTree, Loop, AliasSet information for all instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the loop and loop safety information as arguments.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Diagnostics is emitted via \\p ORE. It returns changed status.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p AllowSpeculation is whether values should be hoisted even if they are not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">/// guaranteed to execute in the loop, but are safe to speculatively execute.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create a new loop identifier for a loop created from a loop transformation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param OrigLoopID The loop ID of the loop before the transformation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param FollowupAttrs List of attribute names that contain attributes to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">///                      added to the new loop ID.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param InheritOptionsAttrsPrefix Selects which attributes should be inherited</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">///                                  from the original loop. The following values</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">///                                  are considered:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">///        nullptr   : Inherit all attributes from @p OrigLoopID.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &quot;&quot;        : Do not inherit any attribute from @p OrigLoopID; only use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    those specified by a followup attribute.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &quot;&lt;prefix&gt;&quot;: Inherit all attributes except those which start with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    &lt;prefix&gt;; commonly used to remove metadata for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    applied transformation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param AlwaysNew If true, do not try to reuse OrigLoopID and never return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">///                  std::nullopt.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @return The loop ID for the after-transformation loop. The following values</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">///         can be returned:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">///         std::nullopt : No followup attribute was found; it is up to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">///                        transformation to choose attributes that make sense.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">///         @p OrigLoopID: The original identifier can be reused.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">///         nullptr      : The new loop has no attributes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">///         MDNode&#42;      : A new unique loop identifier.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">std::optional&lt;MDNode &#42;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a368216c9c116e3f30d8dd352ce1370fc">makeFollowupLoopID</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;OrigLoopID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> FollowupAttrs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;InheritOptionsAttrsPrefix = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AlwaysNew = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns true if is legal to hoist or sink this instruction disregarding the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="comment">/// possible introduction of faults.  Reasoning about potential faulting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions is the responsibility of the caller since it is challenging to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="comment">/// do efficiently from within this routine.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p TargetExecutesOncePerLoop is true only when it is guaranteed that the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="comment">/// target executes at most once per execution of the loop body.  This is used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to assess the legality of duplicating atomic loads.  Generally, this is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="comment">/// true when moving out of loop and not true when moving into loops.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If \\p ORE is set use it to emit optimization remarks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a158e2caed73e4b5d2ad70c1b2a0e0cc8">canSinkOrHoistInst</a>(Instruction &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, AAResults &#42;AA, DominatorTree &#42;DT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">                        Loop &#42;CurLoop, MemorySSAUpdater &amp;MSSAU,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Set weights for \\p UnrolledLoop and \\p RemainderLoop based on weights for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p OrigLoop and the following distribution of \\p OrigLoop iteration among \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="comment">/// UnrolledLoop and \\p RemainderLoop. \\p UnrolledLoop receives weights that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="comment">/// reflect TC/UF iterations, and \\p RemainderLoop receives weights that reflect</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the remaining TC%UF iterations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that \\p OrigLoop may be equal to either \\p UnrolledLoop or \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RemainderLoop in which case weights for \\p OrigLoop are updated accordingly.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note also behavior is undefined if \\p UnrolledLoop and \\p RemainderLoop are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="comment">/// equal. \\p UF must be greater than zero.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If \\p OrigLoop has no profile info associated nothing happens.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This utility may be useful for such optimizations as unroller and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vectorizer as it&#39;s typical transformation for them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Utility that implements appending of loops onto a worklist given a range.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We want to process loops in postorder, but the worklist is a LIFO data</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="comment">/// structure, so we append to it in &#42;reverse&#42; postorder.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For trees, a preorder traversal is a viable reverse postorder, so we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="comment">/// actually append using a preorder walk algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RangeT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if the loop header has a conditional branch that is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop-invariant, because it involves load instructions. If all paths from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="comment">/// either the true or false successor to the header or loop exists do not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="comment">/// modify the memory feeding the condition, perform &#39;partial unswitching&#39;. That</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is, duplicate the instructions feeding the condition in the pre-header. Then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="comment">/// unswitch on the duplicated condition. The condition is now known in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="comment">/// unswitched version for the &#39;invariant&#39; path through the original loop.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the branch condition of the header is partially invariant, return a pair</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the condition in the loops created for the true or false successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
